content: skill level beginner file type pdf file language english file contains step-by-step photo-tutorial with detalied description and charts sizes available xs s-m l yarn merino wool size 4 worsted weight * 9 ply * 250m/100g * 272yds/3 52oz - for size xs - approximately 50g 1 76oz - for size s-m - up to 60g 2 1oz - for size l-xl - up to 70g 2 46oz hook 4 5 mm if you have questions or need any help with the pattern please feel free to message me here on etsy to see more news and patterns follow @tsarevacrochet terms of use pattern or parts of the pattern may not be copied sold or redistributed for any reason pattern or parts of the pattern may not be uploaded or made visible to public view for any reason if you sell products made from this pattern please tag a link for the pattern with marina tsareva designer name please include credits to the designer do not disclose the process or the type of stitches used in the pattern do not use my pictures to advertise your finished product for selling
